item.title: Nix
item.description: Nix is a declarative language aiming produce reproducible systems. In can be used to produce dotfiles. Follows three tools: Home Manager : Manages user’s home. It can’t be used to install fonts for example. Nix Darwin : Manages macOS systems. The goal is to compose these tools to produce a reproducible generation of one’s environment. To aid this, Nix Flakes introduces another layer on top that aims to pin the versions the dependencies through a flake.
